sentences.english: Tea will be exciting live show and the Buddha Tooth Relic shrine activities.
sentences.chinese: 現場將進行精彩的茶藝展示和佛牙參拜活動。

sentences.english: The __tea art performances_ show how to make a perfect cup of tea with beautiful tea sets.
sentences.chinese: 茶藝表演展示了用漂亮的茶具沏一杯極好的茶的方法。

sentences.english: With the emergence of tea culture, tea houses around more to do more.
sentences.chinese: 隨着茶文化的興起，各地茶藝館越辦越多。

definition: appreciation of the finer things in life
to talk freely/to discuss without inhibition
(of knowledge, skill etc) to be passed on from teachers to students, one generation to another, abbr. for 薪盡火傳|薪尽火传[xin1 jin4 huo3 chuan2]

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
tea and cake/refreshments/tea and dimsun 點心|点心, traditional Hong Kong lunch
